fields.name: Header image description
fields.value: An illustration of a hijabi woman waving the Palestinian flag in front of the Dome of the Rock under a night sky. The temple's dome is vivid shades of yellow and reddish orange, and a crescent moon hangs in the sky with multicolored stars
